thread.title: Will Lucas
thread.title_full: Clubhouse Golf reviewed by Will Lucas

author: Will Lucas
title: Will Lucas
text: Very impressed, had a personalised iron fitting in the studio with Peter. Great technology, but the honest advice and guidance around loft/lie/length/shaft/head etc stops people making what can be an expensive mistake. Irons ordered to spec and arrived a week later. Good comms that kept me in touch. All in all a great deal and experience. Would recommend to anyone.
